from LAFITE.reference_processing import RefAnnotationExtraction
from LAFITE.preprocessing import split_bed_line, read_grouping, polya_signal_import, PolyAFinder
from LAFITE.utils import loc_distance, Vividict, temp_dir_creation, bam2bed
from LAFITE.read_collapsing import CoCoWrapper
from collections import defaultdict, Counter, OrderedDict
from interlap import InterLap
from Bio.Seq import Seq
from time import strftime
from tqdm import tqdm
from multiprocessing import Pool
import argparse
import pysam, sys ,os, subprocess

lafite_wrapper(bam, bedtools, gtf, genome, polya, polyA_motif_file, output, sj_correction_window=40, thread=1)

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
def lafite_wrapper(bam, bedtools, gtf, genome, polya, polyA_motif_file, output, sj_correction_window= 40, thread=1):
	# print out input parameters
	sys.stdout.write(f'\n\n')
	sys.stdout.write(f'Input parameters:\n')
	sys.stdout.write(f'read alignment file: {bam}\n')
	sys.stdout.write(f'Reference gene annotation: {gtf}\n')
	sys.stdout.write(f'Reference genome annotation: {genome}\n')
	sys.stdout.write(f'Reads Polyadenylation events: {polya}\n')
	sys.stdout.write(f'Output assembly file: {output}\n')
	sys.stdout.write(f'Edit distance to reference splicing site allowed for splicing correction: {sj_correction_window}\n\n')

	# create temp directory for log and intermediate files
	try:
		output_dir = os.path.dirname(output)
		tmp_dir = temp_dir_creation(output_dir)
	except:
		raise ValueError("Fatal: please provide a valid path for output files\n")

	# reference gene annotation processing
	sys.stdout.write(strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") + ": Preprocessing reference gene annotation\n")
	ref_exon, ref_junction, ref_single_exon_trans, ref_mutple_exon_trans, left_sj_set, right_sj_set, tss_dict = RefAnnotationExtraction(gtf).annotation_sorting()

	
	# processing alignment bam file

	## convert alignment bam file to bed12 format
	try: 
		bam2bed_cmd = bam2bed(bam, tmp_dir.name, bedtools)
	except:
		raise ValueError("Fatal: please provide a valid path for bam file, samtools and bedtools\n")
	
	p = subprocess.run(bam2bed_cmd, shell=True)
	if p.returncode == 0:
		pass
	else:
		raise ValueError("Fatal: error in bam conversion")
	
	## read grouping according to chromosome and strand
	sys.stdout.write(strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") + ": Preprocessing read alignment file\n")
	outbed = os.path.join(output_dir, 'bam.bed')
	junction_dict, processed_read = read_grouping(outbed, genome)

	# polyA info import
	if polya:
		sys.stdout.write(strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") + ": Loading polyA information\n")
		polya_dict = polya_signal_import(polya)
	else:
		sys.stdout.write(strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") + ": No reads Polyadenylation event provided, detecting from sequencing\n")
		polya_dict = PolyAFinder(processed_read, genome, polyA_motif_file).polya_estimation()
	
	# read correction and collapsing
	collected_single_exon_read, collected_multi_exon_read = CoCoWrapper(thread, processed_read, ref_exon, ref_junction, ref_single_exon_trans, ref_mutple_exon_trans, left_sj_set, right_sj_set, junction_dict, sj_correction_window=40, tmp_dir='.', mis_intron_length = 150, corExcept_dis=4, polya_dict=None).result_collection()


if __name__=="__main__":
	parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(description='Low-abundance Aware Full-length Isoform clusTEr')
	parser.add_argument('-a', dest='bam', help='path to the alignment file in bam format', required=True)
	parser.add_argument('-b', dest='bedtools', help='path to the executable bedtools', required=True)
	parser.add_argument('-g', dest='gtf', help='path to the reference gene annotation in GTF format', required=True)
	parser.add_argument('-f', dest='genome', help='path to the reference genome fasta', required=True)
	parser.add_argument('-o', dest='output', help='path to the output file', required=True)
	parser.add_argument('-t', dest='thread', type=int, help='number of the threads')
	parser.add_argument('-p', dest='polya', help='path to the file contains read Polyadenylation event')
	parser.add_argument('-m', dest='polyA_motif_file', help='path to the polya motif file')
	parser.add_argument('--sj_correction_window', dest='sj_correction_window', type=int, help='edit distance to reference splicing site for splicing correction')

	args = parser.parse_args()

	lafite_wrapper(args.bam, args.bedtools, args.gtf, args.genome, args.polya, args.polyA_motif_file, args.output, args.sj_correction_window, args.thread)
